name: Oklahoma Aviation
about: Oklahoma Aviation is a premier flying school dedicated to providing the highest quality of service using superior, late-model aircraft and standardized operating procedures. Our mission is to ensure maximum safety, absolute privacy, and superior service, offering hassle-free and personalized travel experiences. Led by experienced pilots, including our owner and director of operations, Sho, who is type-rated in several jets, and our Chief Flight Instructor, Chase, we focus on delivering best-in-class aviation training. Our team is passionate about broadening flight experience and skills, and we are committed to creating a culture of safety, efficiency, and luxury. At Oklahoma Aviation, we strive to make every interaction a delight, ensuring our clients receive exceptional service from a team of finest pilots and administrators.
services:
["Computerized Testing
Ground School
Intro Flight
Airline Transport Pilot ATP
Commercial
Flight Instructor CFI
Flight Instructor Instrument CFII
